story-text-2: Paul and Koa come together to make Wines and Beers for the lovely folks of Squamish!
owner-1-bio: You know what they say about Paul...
owner-2-bio: Koa loves bold reds, crispy lagers, and a fresh loaf of sourdough bread. After starting homebrewing with his university roommates, Koa worked as a brewer and cellerman at Backcountry Brewing. Hoping to continue his craft for fermentation, Koa became owner of Steins and Vines in 2026, aiming to help others make the best beer and wine possible.
